before_start: Have a DNA Sample ready, typically either from PCR or a recently performed Restriction Digest. Dilute down the 50X TAE Buffer to 1X.

materials.reagent_name: Gel Loading Dye, Purple (6X), no SDS - 4.0 ml

warning: Ethidium Bromide potentially acts as a mutagen or carcinogen.
protocol_affiliation: Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection - National Research Council of Italy (IPSP-CNR)
affiliation: Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection - National Research Council of Italy (IPSP-CNR)

authors_list.name: Simona Abbà
authors_list.affiliation: Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection - National Research Council of Italy (IPSP-CNR)

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ahrl","text":"Pour 150 mL of 0.5X TBE Buffer into a 250 ml Duran Bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"77ofa","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"9363","amount":"150","unit":"2","label":"0.5X TBE buffer","guid":"4A65775DD71E42A685E8D79D3CF4640D"}}],"guid":"3035E7C640204E4A9D799D8C917C0F48","id":659082,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prep Work"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eubhr","text":"Weigh out 1.5 g Agarose and add it to the Duran bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4d97m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"cpnva","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"9364","amount":"1.5","unit":"6","label":"agarose","guid":"8D02D5CFF4CB4D21AE2F7B3255451373"}},{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":2539,"guid":"","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Agarose","_public":"","reagent_vendor_link":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io","sku":"A5304","url":"http:\/\/www.sigmaaldrich.com\/catalog\/product\/sigma\/a5304","vendor":{"name":"Contributed by users","affiliation":null,"username":null,"link":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/1.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/1.png"},"badges":[],"research_interests":null,"id":1},"public":0,"can_edit":0,"stats":{"total_protocols":0}}}],"guid":"DF74D645C0A147E0A6A88887C110140F","id":659083,"previous_id":659082,"previous_guid":"3035E7C640204E4A9D799D8C917C0F48","section":"Prep Work"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as7aa","text":"Place Duran bottle in a microwave on medium power for two minutes or until solution is clear and agarose is completely dissolved, occasionally stirring.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dgln5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"18771","duration":"120","label":"agarose melting","guid":"18CEB5A9738E4A6BABE18D5584D4BD5A"}}],"guid":"B9B5A194842D4EA0B4FF1285E7108509","id":659084,"previous_id":659083,"previous_guid":"DF74D645C0A147E0A6A88887C110140F","section":"Prep Work"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lako","text":"Remove the Duran bottle from the microwave with a glove\/pot holder and let it cool under tap water until you can comfortably pick it up without protection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85h37","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"18772","duration":"120","label":"gel cooling down","guid":"819706121EE64DD6846B4D470C571F40"}}],"guid":"B7B6FF333C92490A822F8C8F5298A74B","id":659085,"previous_id":659084,"previous_guid":"B9B5A194842D4EA0B4FF1285E7108509","section":"Prep Work"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1beoh","text":"Place gel tray on clamp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1av2r","text":"Add well combs and use a level to ensure it is balanced.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2eh3u","text":"Pour 40 ml (small gel) or 70 ml (big gel) of melted agarose into the gel tray and let it sit for 15 minutes, or until\u00a0solid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dvuhi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"18773","duration":"900","label":"gel solidification","guid":"C37CEB967ACC4A4B842DAEE4AD4DA5F3"}}],"guid":"3DFC2C4093AE46C8B3C067F98E3B7EC5","id":659087,"previous_id":659085,"previous_guid":"B7B6FF333C92490A822F8C8F5298A74B","section":"Prep Work"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mhis","text":"Remove the well comb\/s carefully as to not tear the gel and remove the tray from the clamp, but ensure the gel remains in the tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"CC19D451518D42EE97A1D2C47157595A","id":659088,"previous_id":659087,"previous_guid":"3DFC2C4093AE46C8B3C067F98E3B7EC5","section":"Loading the Gel"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l630","text":"Place the gel tray into the gel electrophoresis apparatus with the wells closer to the negative\/black end.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4khmf","text":"Pour additional 0.5X TBE Buffer to fill each side of the apparatus and to create a thin layer of buffer covering the top of the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"73g00","text":"Pipette 5 \u03bcL of the 1kb DNA Ladder with Loading Dye into a well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"56s48","text":"Prepare your DNA samples by adding an adequate amount of Gel Loading Dye (6X) and load them into the wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"mkem","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bmd1s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"9l1gv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":128124,"guid":"","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"1 Kb Plus DNA Ladder","_public":"","reagent_vendor_link":"http:\/\/www.thermofisher.com\/us\/en\/home\/brands\/invitrogen.html","sku":"10787018","url":"https:\/\/www.thermofisher.com\/order\/catalog\/product\/10787018?SID=srch-srp-10787018","vendor":{"name":"Invitrogen - Thermo Fisher","affiliation":null,"username":null,"link":"http:\/\/www.thermofisher.com\/us\/en\/home\/brands\/invitrogen.html","image":{"source":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png"},"badges":[],"research_interests":null,"id":191},"public":0,"can_edit":0,"stats":{"total_protocols":0}}},{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":124778,"guid":"","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"DNA Gel Loading Dye (6X)","_public":"","reagent_vendor_link":"https:\/\/www.thermofisher.com\/us\/en\/home.html","sku":"R0611","url":"","vendor":{"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","affiliation":null,"username":null,"link":"https:\/\/www.thermofisher.com\/us\/en\/home.html","image":{"source":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png","placeholder":"https:\/\/www.protocols.io\/img\/vendors\/placeholder.png"},"badges":[],"research_interests":null,"id":95},"public":0,"can_edit":0,"stats":{"total_protocols":0}}}],"guid":"2A9057EC1AFE4A9E8913811E6BBF42FA","id":659091,"previous_id":659088,"previous_guid":"CC19D451518D42EE97A1D2C47157595A","section":"Loading the Gel"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9cj1","text":"Place lid on apparatus and plug cables into the power supply. Set the power supply to stay at a constant voltage of 90 V (small gel) - 120 V (big gel).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eojlg","text":"Let the gel run until the bromophenol blue reaches the end of the gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"9CF21C81FF214A80810FF55EE5666FF3","id":659093,"previous_id":659091,"previous_guid":"2A9057EC1AFE4A9E8913811E6BBF42FA","section":"Running the Gel"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3acso","text":"Remove the gel from the gel tray after draining excess of TBE Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fsco4","text":"Place gel into a tray with 1% Ethidium Bromide ensuring the solution does not come into contact with your skin, then place the tray over a shaker with gentle agitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dgtq9","text":"Let the gel stain for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85l25","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"18775","duration":"900","label":"","guid":"1FE472A9D62149AA8F0B41A4203A5651"}}],"guid":"31E8544AA2B840F18DF539910F783F80","id":659096,"previous_id":659093,"previous_guid":"9CF21C81FF214A80810FF55EE5666FF3","section":"Staining"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kq8t","text":"Carefully remove the gel from the Ethidium Bromide solution and place it ina tray with distilled water, then place the tray over a shaker with gentle agitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"er53r","text":"Let the gel destain for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"856D4E8A24624F0B90FC4D3867254A68","id":659097,"previous_id":659096,"previous_guid":"31E8544AA2B840F18DF539910F783F80","section":"Destaining"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb90a","text":"Place the gel on top of a UV light source with a camera.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8o1ke","text":"Turn on the UV light and capture a picture of the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"3F32AE8818634EA080443EC4DCAE87E0","id":659098,"previous_id":659097,"previous_guid":"856D4E8A24624F0B90FC4D3867254A68","section":"UV exposure"}
